Correct the value. It should be 0x0F instead of 0x0A.
The AND value needs to be corrected.
Please define in const. Avoid using magic numbers
Lets avoid using namespace at top. It reduces readability and difficult to locate the root of any variable.

Can we avoid "using namespaces" in header file as it can lead to ambiguities.
Although it is under another namespace but as a general practice.
Ignore the comment as these are not "using namespaces"
nit: You can get rid of these levels.
nit:published? Also brief needs to be wrapped under one line?
Please use reference here as well.
It is an abbreviation. Should be in caps.
We can have it as const as we are not modifying this value.
Very generic name, can we have a specific name for this map.
Is there a chance we will be modifying this value in the implementation?
